replies.bodyText: Yes, I added reviewers and took this out of draft state prematurely - I noticed this as I was typing up some notes in the description. I will take a look at this.
replies.author: petesantos

timeline.message: Add breadcrumb and helpContentKey to react route

timeline.author: calbach

timeline.bodyText: Confirming: does the reactRouteData store get cleared with an empty object when you navigate away from the React routes? Or will this potentially contain stale data from the most recent route? Probably won't be a problem here..
timeline.author: calbach

replies.bodyText: This will contain stale data when navigating away. Once a react route is engaged again the data in the store will be completely replaced.
replies.author: petesantos
